effect.black-white: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.black-2-white-2: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.black-white: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.black-white: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
